title: Leap Of Love
lyrics:
I keep my distance
All the while
Cause I know you've been true
To your mind
You know I love you

Oh so well

But you know you have been

Deceiving yourself



You know you cannot hide

All the time

Gotta grow into a mountain

Little child



How can I live

Give it up

When I have this funny feeling

In my gut



All I know

There's a fever I can't shake

Roll the dice

In the night I held you down

All the same

In a place, I couldn't name

You're so far

On the other side of the day

Is a star



You've got the answers

In your glove

But you've gotta take

A leap of love





You know I know you

But I can't stay

And you're headed down your own road
